query:
UPDATE users
        SET
            first_name = COALESCE($2, first_name),
            last_name = COALESCE($3, last_name),
            email = COALESCE($4, email),
            phone_number = COALESCE($5, phone_number),
            is_male = COALESCE($6, is_male),
            updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        WHERE id = $1
